title: Lumberjack

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a target to Split, or choose to Premeditate.
- If you Split your target, you attack them. It may have additional effects depending on premeditation.
- At night, if you Premeditate, you become more brutal in your attacks, gaining buffs.

fields.name: Effects of Total Nights of Premeditation:
fields.value:
0: No effects.
1: When you Split a target, you use your axe to carve out their features, cleaning them. You also lure players who attempt to roleblock or control you into the forest and attack-clean them.
2: When you kill a player, leave their blood on all players who visited them or who they visited, other than yourself. Blood causes players to appear suspicious. You now have a 100% chance to gain 1 organ from all kills.
3: Players you Split explode into guts, leaving 4 organs behind instead of 1, and you deal an unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time you kill a player, you have a 50% chance to gain an organ.
- You appear suspicious if you've premeditated at least once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4325
*As each log was split in two, the lumberjack remembered the man that attacked him the previous night. Each chop of the axe was performed with cruelty, yet the swings were filled with methodical technique.*
